text: Carel Struycken (born 30 July 1948) is a Dutch movie, television and stage actor. He is known for playing The Giant in the television series Twin Peaks (1990-1991, 2017), the occasional guest role as Mr. Homn in Star Trek: The Next Generation (1987-1992), and the household butler Lurch in the three 1990s Addams Family movies. He also appeared in the movies Gerald's Game (2017) and Doctor Sleep (2019). ==Other websites== Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from The Hague Category:Dutch movie actors Category:Dutch television actors
title: Carel Struycken
